group_1.narration: Tsuruno and her friends continued to fight@valiantly against the time-devouring demon.

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:1004A01]Y-yaaah!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:0001_jump01]BA-BAM!
Ugh, nothing's working.
Things are getting dire... [chara:100400:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:100400:lipSynch_1]What should we@do?
[chara:110300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait. Dire?

group_1.narration: "Oh yes! And I'll give you this."
"Huh? Is this...a jewel?"
"Try using it when things are especially@dire. [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Farewell!"

group_1.textRight: We should try using that jewel we got back@there!

group_1.narration: When Tsuruno tried brandishing the@jewel that strange Coordinator gave her...
A brand new power awoke inside of her!

group_1.textRight: Awesome!
I've been reborn! Now I'm the Invincible@[textBlue:Blue Tsuruno Mark III]!
Whoa! If this were a Decagon Ball episode...
...your punches would be 5 times more@powerful than your Super Tsuruno Mark II!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][se:8000_flame_01_s]Ha!
You've had enough!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][se:4051_landing_throw]Dinner is OVER!

group_1.textLeft: We did it!

group_1.narration: Once Tsuruno's team had bested@the monster, all of the time it had@ingested came back in its entirety.
The smiles returned to the faces@of everyone in the Smiley Kingdom!

group_1.textLeft: Now what?

group_1.textCenter: Wanna have some hotpot near here?
We can look up at the shiny Ferris wheel.

group_1.textRight: Oh, that'd be nice.

group_1.narration: But what became of Tsuruno and@her friends after their quest was over?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! This new Ferris wheel looks amazing!

group_1.textCenter: *Giggle* It looks like it was worth all of@us putting in the effort to build it!

group_1.textLeft: I'm wiped now, though. I don't wanna do any@more work!

group_1.narration: After they put a little bit of hard work into@building that new Ferris wheel...
The three of them went back to@their usual routines. Taking it easy@with big smiles on their faces.
"The Tale of the Smiley Kingdom"
THE END

group_1.textRight: Oooh!
Thanks so much! Now it feels like a proper@story!

group_1.textLeft: I'm so glad! Did you like it?

group_1.textRight: I loved it!
Except for that part where the Coordinator@pops up and then vanishes!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Huh?! But that was my favorite part...
I came up with that bit all on my own,@without input from anyone else!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
(Well, now it makes sense why that part felt@so forced!)

group_1.textLeft: But I have to ask, Tsuruno... Why?

group_1.textRight: Huh? What're you talking about?

group_1.textLeft: The Smiley Kingdom.
It's based on your experiences at Chelation@Land, right?
I assume you don't have any particularly@nice memories of it.
But in your story, it sounds like such a@fun place...

group_1.textRight: Oh!
Yeah... I was trying to do terrible things@there.
I have a lot to think about on that bit.
But I was really fond of how it was a place@where you didn't have to try at anything.
It was a really nice idea...
Though I guess, right now...
It's gone back to being an unused field.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, Chelation Land doesn't exist anymore...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
But I made the decision to live here in this@world.
This place, the one I'm living in now...
I want to make it into a Smiley Kingdom@that outshines Chelation Land!
That's why I decided to write it!

group_1.textLeft: Ahhh, [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]I see.
Do your best to make it happen, Tsuruno!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Thanks.
[chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh! Right!
I gotta do something to thank you for helping@me out!

group_1.textLeft: There's no need, really.
It was such a fun little story!
I just wanted to chip in. That's enough for@me.

group_1.textRight: But you totally reworked it from the ground@up...

group_1.textLeft: Then how about this?
You could put a little ad for my services at@the end of the show!
Something like...

group_1.narration: "The Tale of the Smiley Kingdom"
THE END
Brought to You By@Chinese Restaurant Banbanzai
With Cooperation From...@The Mysterious Coordinator
[textRed:Free trial sessions available NOW!]

group_1.textRight: I don't mind adding that... Are you sure@that's all you want?

group_1.textLeft: It's more than enough!
Who knows? Perhaps my future regulars...
...will be in your audience. Right?

group_1.narration: *Clatter*
— Tsuruno —@(I'm back, guys.)
— Tsuruno —@(I've come home.)
— Tsuruno —@(To the place where I can feel safe...)
— Tsuruno —@(My own Smiley Kingdom.)

group_1.textCenter: (We've gotta work together to keep our@spirits high!)
(That way we can all keep on smiling...)

group_1.narration: To that girl I will never see again...
The girl who loved Mikazuki Villa with@all her heart. I'll do my absolute best...
So I can tell you "Mikazuki Villa is@just like it always was" with pride!
